code: import React from'react';import{ChevronDown,GraduationCap,Home}from'lucide-react';import'./MilestoneSelector.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MilestoneSelector=_ref=>{let{selectedMilestone,onMilestoneChange}=_ref;const milestones=[{id:'college',name:'College Journey',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GraduationCap,{size:20}),description:'Plan your education finances'},{id:'house',name:'Home Ownership',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{size:20}),description:'Save for your dream home'}];const currentMilestone=milestones.find(m=>m.id===selectedMilestone);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"milestone-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"selector-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Choose Your Milestone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Select a financial journey to track your progress"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"selector-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"current-milestone",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"milestone-icon",children:currentMilestone.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"milestone-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:currentMilestone.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:currentMilestone.description})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"milestone-dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:selectedMilestone,onChange:e=>onMilestoneChange(e.target.value),className:"milestone-select",children:milestones.map(milestone=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:milestone.id,children:milestone.name},milestone.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronDown,{size:16,className:"dropdown-icon"})]})]})]});};export default MilestoneSelector;
